title: Any plot / layout having area under non-buildable / open space reservations admeasuring up to 500 Sq
clause_text: Any plot / layout having area under non-buildable / open space reservations admeasuring up to 500 Sq.m. shall be cleared by shifting the slum-dwellers from that site.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Any plot / layout having area under non-buildable / open space reservations admeasuring up to 500 Sq.m. shall be cleared by shifting the slum-dwellers from that site.
